INSERT INTO Board(BNO, MNO, KBNO, BTITLE, BCONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{kindOfBoardNo}, #{title}, #{content})
SELECT SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT B.BNO, CB.CBNO, CNAME, C.CNO, MNICKNAME, M.MNO, SGNAME, CATENAME, B.BTITLE, B.BDATE, B.BCONTENT, RCNO, COMPLAIN, VIEWS, SCRAP, CBIMG, MAX_COUNT, CUR_COUNT, ROWNUM AS RN FROM Board B JOIN BoardCategoryBoard BCB ON (B.BNO = BCB.BNO) JOIN CategoryBoard CB ON (CB.CBNO = BCB.CBNO) JOIN KindOfBoard KB ON (CB.KBNO = KB.KBNO) JOIN Member M ON (B.MNO = M.MNO) JOIN Club C ON (C.CNO = CB.CNO) JOIN SmallGroupCategory SGC ON (CB.SGCNO = SGC.SGCNO) JOIN SmallGroup SG ON (SG.SGNO = SGC.SGNO) JOIN Category CE ON (CE.CATENO = SGC.CATENO) WHERE KB.KBNO = 1 AND B.STATUS = 'N' AND CE.CATENO = #{categoryNo} ORDER BY B.BNO) WHERE RN >= #{startNum} AND RN <= #{endNum}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT B.BNO, CB.CBNO, CNAME, C.CNO, MNICKNAME, M.MNO, SGNAME, CATENAME, B.BTITLE, B.BDATE, B.BCONTENT, RCNO, COMPLAIN, VIEWS, SCRAP, CBIMG, MAX_COUNT, CUR_COUNT, ROWNUM AS RN FROM Board B JOIN BoardCategoryBoard BCB ON (B.BNO = BCB.BNO) JOIN CategoryBoard CB ON (CB.CBNO = BCB.CBNO) JOIN KindOfBoard KB ON (CB.KBNO = KB.KBNO) JOIN Member M ON (B.MNO = M.MNO) JOIN Club C ON (C.CNO = CB.CNO) JOIN SmallGroupCategory SGC ON (CB.SGCNO = SGC.SGCNO) JOIN SmallGroup SG ON (SG.SGNO = SGC.SGNO) JOIN Category CE ON (CE.CATENO = SGC.CATENO) WHERE B.BTITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' AND KB.KBNO = 1 AND B.STATUS = 'N' AND CE.CATENO = #{categoryNo} ORDER BY B.BNO) WHERE RN >= #{startNum} AND RN <= #{endNum}

SELECT B.BNO, CB.CBNO, CNAME, C.CNO, MNICKNAME, M.MNO, SGNAME, CATENAME, B.BTITLE, B.BDATE, B.BCONTENT, RCNO, COMPLAIN, VIEWS, SCRAP, CBIMG, MAX_COUNT, CUR_COUNT FROM Board B JOIN BoardCategoryBoard BCB ON (B.BNO = BCB.BNO) JOIN CategoryBoard CB ON (CB.CBNO = BCB.CBNO) JOIN KindOfBoard KB ON (CB.KBNO = KB.KBNO) JOIN Member M ON (B.MNO = M.MNO) JOIN Club C ON (C.CNO = CB.CNO) JOIN SmallGroupCategory SGC ON (CB.SGCNO = SGC.SGCNO) JOIN SmallGroup SG ON (SG.SGNO = SGC.SGNO) JOIN Category C ON (C.CATENO = SGC.CATENO) WHERE KBNO = 1 AND B.BNO = #{boardId} AND B.STATUS = 'N'

SELECT B.BNO, C.CALNO, B.MNO, CB.CBNO, B.BTITLE, B.BCONTENT, C.ST_SCHEDULE, C.EN_SCHEDULE FROM CalendarCategoryBoard CCB JOIN Calendar C ON (CCB.CALNO = C.CALNO) JOIN CategoryBoard CB ON (CB.CBNO = CCB.CBNO) JOIN BoardCalendar BC ON (BC.CALNO = C.CALNO) JOIN Board B ON (B.BNO = BC.BNO) WHERE CB.CBNO = #{categoryBoardNo} AND B.STATUS = 'N'

SELECT B.BNO, C.CALNO, B.MNO, CB.CBNO, B.BTITLE, B.BCONTENT, C.ST_SCHEDULE, C.EN_SCHEDULE FROM CalendarCategoryBoard CCB JOIN Calendar C ON (CCB.CALNO = C.CALNO) JOIN CategoryBoard CB ON (CB.CBNO = CCB.CBNO) JOIN BoardCalendar BC ON (BC.CALNO = C.CALNO) JOIN Board B ON (B.BNO = BC.BNO) WHERE B.BNO = #{boardNo} AND B.STATUS = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE Board SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE BNO = #{boardNo}
UPDATE Board SET BCONTENT = #{content}, BTITLE = #{title} WHERE BNO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(BNO), BTITLE, BCONTENT, CBIMG FROM CATEGORYBOARD JOIN BOARDCATEGORYBOARD USING (CBNO) JOIN BOARD USING (BNO) WHERE STATUS = 'N' AND CNO IN ( SELECT CNO FROM MEMBERCLUB WHERE MNO = #{userNo} ) ORDER BY BNO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CATEGORYBOARD JOIN BOARDCATEGORYBOARD USING (CBNO) JOIN BOARD USING (BNO) WHERE STATUS = 'N' AND CNO IN ( SELECT CNO FROM MEMBERCLUB WHERE MNO = #{userNo} )

SELECT B.BTITLE, RCONTENT, A.BNO, CBIMG, TO_CHAR(RDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RDATE FROM REPLY A JOIN BOARD B ON (A.BNO = B.BNO) JOIN BOARDCATEGORYBOARD C ON (B.BNO = C.BNO) JOIN CATEGORYBOARD D ON (C.CBNO = D.CBNO) WHERE A.MNO = #{userNo} AND A.STATUS='N' AND B.STATUS='N'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY A JOIN BOARD B ON (A.BNO = B.BNO) JOIN BOARDCATEGORYBOARD C ON (B.BNO = C.BNO) JOIN CATEGORYBOARD D ON (C.CBNO = D.CBNO) WHERE A.MNO = #{userNo} AND A.STATUS='N' AND B.STATUS='N'

SELECT D.BNO, D.BTITLE, D.BCONTENT, B.CBIMG FROM BOOKCATEGORY A JOIN CATEGORYBOARD B ON (A.CBNO = B.CBNO) JOIN BOARDCATEGORYBOARD C ON (B.CBNO = C.CBNO) JOIN BOARD D ON (C.BNO = D.BNO) WHERE A.MNO = #{userNo} AND D.STATUS = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKCATEGORY A JOIN CATEGORYBOARD B ON (A.CBNO = B.CBNO) JOIN BOARDCATEGORYBOARD C ON (B.CBNO = C.CBNO) JOIN BOARD D ON (C.BNO = D.BNO) WHERE A.MNO = #{userNo} AND D.STATUS = 'N'

SELECT BNO, BTITLE, TO_CHAR(BDATE, 'YY-MM-DD') BDATE, BCONTENT, KIND_OF_INQUIRY FROM BOARDINQUIRY LEFT JOIN INQUIRY USING(INO) LEFT JOIN BOARD USING(BNO) JOIN INQUIRYGROUP USING (IGNO) WHERE MNO = #{userNo} AND STATUS = 'N'
SELECT BNO, BTITLE, BDATE, ORGFILENAMES, CHGFILENAMES, BCONTENT FROM BOARDINQUIRY JOIN BOARD USING(BNO) JOIN INQUIRY USING(INO) WHERE MNO = #{userNo} AND BNO = #{boardNo}

SELECT ROWNUM, BNO, CBNO, CNAME, CNO, MNICKNAME, MNO, SGNAME, CATENAME, BTITLE, BDATE, BCONTENT, RCNO, COMPLAIN, VIEWS, SCRAP, CBIMG, MAX_COUNT, CUR_COUNT
FROM (SELECT B.BNO, CB.CBNO, CNAME, C.CNO, MNICKNAME, M.MNO, SGNAME, CATENAME, B.BTITLE, B.BDATE, B.BCONTENT, RCNO, COMPLAIN, VIEWS, SCRAP, CBIMG, MAX_COUNT, CUR_COUNT FROM Board B JOIN BoardCategoryBoard BCB ON (B.BNO = BCB.BNO) JOIN CategoryBoard CB ON (CB.CBNO = BCB.CBNO) JOIN KindOfBoard KB ON (CB.KBNO = KB.KBNO) JOIN Member M ON (B.MNO = M.MNO) JOIN Club C ON (C.CNO = CB.CNO) JOIN SmallGroupCategory SGC ON (CB.SGCNO = SGC.SGCNO) JOIN SmallGroup SG ON (SG.SGNO = SGC.SGNO) JOIN Category C ON (C.CATENO = SGC.CATENO) WHERE KB.KBNO = 1 AND B.STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY RCNO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <=5
